name: BUD
description:
Bud is a small plat former 2 levels created as part of a Teesside University Masters Module.

Still underdevelopment B.U.D is designed to be simplistic and minimal in design.

It is your job as a Basic Utility Droid or B.U.D for short to go through the universe to find out why the portals are acting up. The orbs of power are moving through the universe only B.U.D can collect them and bring the universe back to natural order.
